title: Bloodwoven
description: Lies woven in blood are lines waiting to be crossed.Lin is a competent, dedicated soldier but his mission takes a drastic turn when one of his charges is found murdered. Soon after, he is ambushed by magic-twisted monsters, gravely wounded, and abandoned by his one remaining ally.Waking to find his injuries healed by forbidden magic, Lin is marked as an oathbreaker by the very laws and beliefs he upholds.Lin soon finds his faith in the faction he’s lived his life upholding tested by the woman who saved him from the brink of death. With his fate hanging by a thread, he faces an impossible stand by his new ally and seek vengeance for his murdered charge or betray her for amnesty from those who’d execute him.
author: G.J. Terral
